backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, their target files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including the landing page, styles, config, and icons.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH theme tokens and global CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing metadata and mounting root for the React SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple React wrapper that renders the PawfectCareLanding component.
frontend/src/components/icons/MobileInHa: SVG icon component representing a hand holding a mobile phone with signal waves.
frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLandi: Large landing page component implementing hero, overview, membership, services, FAQ, testimonials, and other sections for Pawfect Care.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages a backend actor using identity state and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook for handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global theme and color system defining Chewy‑blue–aligned OKLCH tokens, light/dark palettes, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, plugins, extended colors, layout, animations, and theme customizations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, issues, and design guidelines for the Pawfect Care landing page.
